data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Jimmy has a busy year planned. In ____ fall, he ____ taking a trip ____ Europe. During ____ his ____ is ____ him ____ the ____. In April, ____ is ____ to ____ a ____ job. At the beginning of the summer in June he will look for a new house to buy.
data.partBlankContent: Jimmy has a busy year planned. In t__ fall, he i_ taking a trip t_ Europe. During win___ his fam___ is visi____ him f__ the hol____. In April, h_ is go___ to st___ a n__ job. At the beginning of the summer in June he will look for a new house to buy.
data.answer: 吉米有一个忙碌的一年计划。今年秋天，他要去欧洲旅行。冬天，他的家人会来看望他。四月，他将开始一份新工作。六月初夏，他要找一套新房子买。
